page.title: 02My Family.
page.content: My family live in Wootton Courtenay in the first house in Stoney Close.Our house is a semi-detached house.It used to be Council house but now we have bought it.There are five people in my family:my mummy and daddy,my gran and my elder sister Jillian,who is fifteen My dad works as a man who repairs houses and things.My mum works for a lady called Mrs. Johns. Occasionally my sister works at the Dunkery Hotel which is next to us.Sometimes on Sundays we go out to together for a walk usually on the Moor. Every Sunday we go to church in Minehead because we are Catholics.When we come home we all have breakfast together. We go for holidays together but we have never been further than Plymouth.
